### How to make a breakfast
* Milk
* Bread
* Cup Noodles
* Cereal
* Fruit

## Kitchen Tools
* Toaster
* Tea Kettle
* Knife

# Steps
1. boil water in tea kettle 
2. pour out milk and mix with cereal
3. put bread into toaster and wait for one minute
4. use a knife to cut fruit
5. pour boiled water into cup noodle and wait for three minutes
6. prepare a sheet of paper and put all the food on it
7. the cup noodle is ready to eat 
8. begin eating
